item.title: People dumping rubbish, 22nd July
item.description:
This van has been round multiple times filling up our bins and if they are full dumping it next to them. We have a rodent problem and itâ€™s all because of the flying around here

item.title: Park water play area not working and needs weeding, 22nd July
item.description:
Its school holidays, its warm, ideal time to play in the park water feature. Unfortunately it is not working and has weeds growing around it. Please can the council get this facility working again as my kids love playing here?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish & clothes on patch of green at the end of Palatine Road, 22nd July
item.description:
This mess has been there since the weekend and I've seen individual road sweepers in the areas, so not sure why its not been cleaned up. There always seems to be litter on this patch of grass from parents picking up from the school. Can you provide a bin?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Palatine Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly posting by estate agents, 22nd July
item.description:
There are 12 boards here. No flats for sale or rent. This is illegal fly posting. Estate agents commonly put boards up along Bromley common and masons hill. There are no flats for rent or sale. Please can enforcement action be taken and these signs removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Masons Hill, Widmore, London
